item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Pyromaniac
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
It still wastes kills. If the unseen attacked a firehexed person, you just saved them for no reason and wasted unseen kill. That goes against your goals. Sure, you kill the same number of people but A: It is delayed, and B: You waste unseen kills. It’s not like if Possessor and Unseen kill the same person, that has one chance of happening. But if someone is firehexed for three night, Unseen are 3 times as likely to waste kill, as well as the Pyromaniac’s

EDIT: Also, why is this in the general category?

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Pyromaniac
item.dc:creator: CheesyKnives
item.description:
The night abilities are essentially the same , otherwise this wouldn’t be not arsonist. :^)
I can rundown each ability:
Firehexed is this NK’s main form of death immunity. All Nk’s need one , or their gonna have a rough time. Immune to Ignite so he doesnt die when he uses it.
1000 Degrees Just for some more direct killing. Keep in mind Phys, Alch, and Herb arent immune to this.
Impatient Is the main method for direct killing, if else.
Firehex Is the Pyro’s main form of deception. The targets of this ability will recieve 2 main characteristics of the Pyro , death immunity , and a class change to investigators. This means you wont also be immediately outed if you are attacked.
Ignite is Pyros main ability. lets them all burn. >:)
